item.description:
Dr. Pratibha Shah, an Ayurvedic practitioner for 20yrs, will present an introduction to the ancient healing art of Ayurveda. Ayurvedic philosophy, their basic principles, the concept of body-types and their relation to diet will be among the topics explored in this presentation. Dr. Shah will also help you discover your own unique body-type so you can begin applying Ayurvedic principles in your own life.

Find out how this ancient wisdom can transform your health, mind and relationship to yourself.

Dr.Shahâ€™s Bio: http://www.zanjabee.com/practitioners/pratibha-shah

To pay by credit card or PayPal, visit our website at: http://acropolisboston.org/register.php?eventid=211

group.name: Practical Philosophy -- Application of Timeless Wisdom

item.name: Ayurveda: ancient secrets of health revealed
